entry.title: ShaAnder/Ping_Me_Frontend: Part 1 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). entry.title: ssanaullahrais/shadow-dom-kit: ShadowDomKit is a lightweight JavaScript utility designed to solve the challenges of working with components inside Shadow DOM. It provides a simple, consistent API for finding elements and initializing JavaScript components across Shadow DOM boundaries.

entry.title: YaroslavKS/Mini_SCADA_presentation: A lightweight SCADA-like interface prototype that simulates industrial process monitoring. Features include animated flow visualization, temperature/pressure sensors, warning logic, and real-time status display using vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

entry.title: AR10Dev/DragBoard: A lightweight, responsive Kanban board application built with React, Redux Toolkit, and react-beautiful-dnd.
